text: == Biography == Noa Kirel is an Israeli singer, actress, and songwriter who has gained popularity for her unique style and talent. Born on April 10, 2001, in Raanana, Israel, Kirel began her career in the entertainment industry at a young age. She started performing in local productions and quickly caught the attention of industry professionals with her powerful voice and stage presence. Kirel's music is characterized by catchy melodies and heartfelt lyrics that resonate with her audience. She often incorporates elements of pop, R&B;, and electronic music into her songs, creating a sound that is both contemporary and timeless. Some of her most popular songs include "Medabrim Shalom", "Makom Besof", and "Yesh Bi Ahava". In addition to her music career, Kirel has also made a name for herself as an actress. She has appeared in a number of Israeli television shows and movies, showcasing her versatility and talent as a performer. Kirel's ability to seamlessly transition between music and acting has earned her a dedicated fan base and critical acclaim. One of the reasons why Kirel has resonated with so many fans is her authenticity and relatability. She is known for being down-to-earth and approachable, often sharing insights into her life and experiences on social media. Kirel's openness and vulnerability have endeared her to fans around the world, who appreciate her willingness to be true to herself. Kirel's success has not come without challenges, however. Like many young artists, she has faced criticism and doubt from skeptics who question her talent and staying power in the industry. Despite these obstacles, Kirel has remained steadfast in her commitment to her craft, continuing to push boundaries and break new ground with each project she undertakes. In conclusion, Noa Kirel is a rising star in the entertainment industry whose talent and charisma have captivated audiences around the world. With her powerful voice, relatable lyrics, and engaging performances, she has proven herself to be a force to be reckoned with in the music and acting worlds. As she continues to evolve and grow as an artist, there is no doubt that Kirel will leave a lasting impact on the industry and inspire future generations of artists to follow their dreams. == Career == In 2016, she won the award Singer of the Year at the Israeli Kids' Choice Awards. Kirel has also worked as a television host and actress in several films and movies. She was also a judge on the first two seasons of Israel's Got Talent. From 2020 to 2022, Kirel served in the Israel Defense Forces and received an honorable discharge once she completed her mandatory service. In 2023, Kirel represented Israel in the Eurovision Song Contest 2023 with the song "Unicorn". She placed third in the grand final. == Sources == Category:Israeli singers Category:Israeli actors Category:Israeli television presenters Category:2001 births Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Noa Kirel
